programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the days games in the EFL including Blackburn Rovers v Stoke City, Derby County v Southampton, Preston North End v Charlton Athletic, and Watford v Oxford United.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: Sweary national treasure Danny Dyer faces the grilling of a lifetime from a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers where no subject is out of bounds.

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: David Tennant faces a grilling by a collective of autistic and learning-disabled interviewers, from questions about his skincare regime to his cancelled friend.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Long Lost Family Special: The Mother and Baby Home Scandal
programme.desc: First of a two-part series. A woman sent to a mother and baby home aged 16 seeks a daughter while two sisters are looking for their older sister.

programme.title: Raymond Blancs Royal Kitchen Gardens
programme.desc: A trip to Ayrshire sees Raymond visit the splendid Dumfries House and hear how King Charles IIIs passion for sustainability is being passed on.

programme.title: MandS: Dress the Nation
programme.desc: Guest expert Mark Wright joins hosts Vernon Kay and AJ Odudu as the remaining amateur designers compete for a dream mentorship with high street giant MandS in Menswear Week.

programme.title: James Martins Saturday Morning
programme.desc: Joining James down in the Hampshire countryside this time are the singer James Morrison and chefs Aktar Islam, Shivi Ramoutar and Daniel Clifford.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan are the irrepressible Les Dennis to talk about a life in the spotlight and actress Samantha Womack on her return to the stage in the play Dear England.

programme.title: EFL Live: Ipswich Town v Norwich City
programme.desc: Hugh Woozencroft presents EFL action from the Championship as Ipswich Town take on bitter rivals Norwich City in the East Anglian derby at Portman Road.

programme.title: STV Racing: Prix de LArc de Triomphe
programme.desc: Francesca Cumani, Ed Chamberlin and Oli Bell present coverage of the 2025 Prix de LArc de Triomphe - Europes premier middle-distance race - from Paris-Longchamp.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: Relive some of the most dramatic end games in Tipping Point history!

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Im A Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! stars AJ Pritchard, Hollie Arnold, Giovanna Fletcher and Russell Watson take on one of the countrys finest quizzers.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: MandS: Dress the Nation
programme.desc: Guest expert Lily Cole joins hosts Vernon Kay and AJ Odudu as the remaining amateur designers compete for a dream mentorship with high street giant MandS in the semi-final.

programme.title: Beat the Chasers
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as more contestants from across the country hope that they can beat The Sinnerman, The Beast, The Governess, The Menace, The Vixen and The Dark Destroyer.

programme.title: Frauds
programme.desc: The first episode of a story of survival, deception and revenge. When Bert is released from prison, theres only one person she can turn to and rekindle her friendship with.

programme.desc: Action crime drama film reboot. A playboy begins a fight to free his home from corruption.

programme.desc: This episode features unseen questions from The Assemblys grillings of David Tennant, Gary Lineker, Danny Dyer and Jade alongside more revelations from the interviewed stars.

programme.title: Nisha Katonas Home Kitchen
programme.desc: Cooking series. Nisha Katona cooks a Bengali stuffed fish in banana leaves, a thyme and apple cake for dessert and a stunning roast rib of beef with some spiced cumin green beans.

programme.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

programme.desc: DIY SOS star Nick Knowles joins Lorraine to reveal why he and his army of volunteers have taken on their most ambitious project yet.

programme.desc: Magazine show with celebrity guests, entertainment, advice, competitions and features.

programme.desc: David Dickinson pitches up in Burton with his team of dealers including Henry Nicholls, Stewart Hofgartner, Tim Hogarth and Mark Stevens.

programme.desc: A team of five workmates from Wales attempt to answer a series of Top 10 list questions for their chance to win a bumper cash prize.

programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.desc: Join Bradley Walsh as Liam from Manchester, Alison from Beverley, Heather from Doncaster and Mike from Marlborough put everything on the line hoping to defeat one of the Chasers.

programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Charity covertly chases up her paternity test results as Chas is stunned to hear of her situation, and April leaves home.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Asha resorts to extreme measures to escape her mental struggles, Tim picks up a former girlfriend in his cab, and Todd berates Theo for doing a disappearing act.

programme.title: Frauds
programme.desc: Crime drama. Bert reveals her master plan, but Sam knows nothing that will ever be straightforward with Bert - meanwhile, a shock discovery threatens to derail the heist.

programme.desc: The days national and international news with a fresh perspective.

programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective
